articles.author: Jonathan Cable, Leika Kihara, Lucia Mutikani
articles.title: World factory activity shrinks as China, slowing growth take toll - Reuters
articles.description: Global factory activity remained in a slump in July, private surveys showed on Tuesday, a sign slowing growth and weakness in China were taking a toll on the world economy, though the picture in the Americas was notably less bleak than elsewhere.
articles.content: LONDON/TOKYO/WASHINGTON, Aug 1 (Reuters) - Global factory activity remained in a slump in July, private surveys showed on Tuesday, a sign slowing growth and weakness in China were taking a toll on th… [+5393 chars]
